column1: '''The Dragon's Visit''' is a humorous poem about a [[Dragons|dragon]]
column2: written by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] (probably in [[1928]]) in his series ''[[Tales and Songs of Bimble Bay]]''. When submitting a number of poems for ''[[The Adventures of Tom Bombadil|The Adventures of Tom Bombadil and Other Verses from the Red Book]]'' in [[1962]]
column3: "The Dragon's Visit" was included but was eventually omitted from the collection.<ref>{{CG|RG}}
column4: p. 214</ref> [[Douglas A. Anderson]] has suggested that Tolkien perhaps thought the poem unsuitable within the [[legendarium]].<ref>{{HM|AH}}
